title: The Reason
lyrics:
Daleun gong-gan gat-eun haneul alae
Majuchyeossdeon uli
Al su eobsneun gong-gi
Gadeug chaewossdeon giundeul-i
Nun-eul gam-eumyeo neoleul kkumkkumyeo ppajyeodeul-eo

Seumyeodeul-eo hangeol-eum neoege

Sum-eul naeswimyeo cheoncheonhi dagagalge

Nae son-eul jab-a forever my love



Neoui misoman-i naleul umjig-yeo

Gibun joh-eun haluleul sijaghaneun iyu

Neoui moseubdeul-i naleul usge hae

Eodil gado neowa hamkke issneun gibun



If itâ€™s a dream

Kkum-eseo kkaeji anhgil bala

Haengboghan gieog-eun seulpeul ttae gieoghalago issneun geonde



Al su eobsneun naeil-ila haedo neowa hamkkemyeon dwae

Jeo kkeutkkaji dallyeo see the sunrise, you and me

Eodil gado neowa hamkke issneun gibun

Geuge naega sal-aganeun iyu



Jichin halue himdeun naldeul-e jigeumcheoleom

Dagawa jwo nae mam-eul an-ajwo

Maeil giloghae neowaui sigandeul-eul

Neoleul kkog dam-a forever my love



Neoui misoman-i naleul umjig-yeo

Gibun joh-eun haluleul sijaghaneun iyu

Neoui moseubdeul-i naleul usge hae

Eodil gado neowa hamkke issneun gibun



Sum-eul swieodo neowa hamkke issneun gibun

Nae mamsog-e nega salgo issneun iyu



I haengbog-i gakkeum-eun geob-i na all mine

Nun tteumyeon achim-i neol delyeogalkka afraid



Yeong-won-ilaneun heosdoen kkumdeul-eun naleul kkaewo

Sum-eoissdeon bul-anhan ma-eum-eul

Allyeojujiman nan pogihal su eobs-eo

Nae son-eul kkog jab-a you are my love



Neoui misoman-i naleul umjig-yeo

Gibun joh-eun haluleul sijaghaneun iyu

Neoui moseubdeul-i naleul usge hae

Eodil gado neowa hamkke issneun gibun



Sum-eul swieodo neowa hamkke issneun gibun

Nae mamsog-e nega salgo issneun iyu



I haengbog-i gakkeum-eun geob-i na all mine

Nuntteumyeon achim-i neol delyeogalkka afraid
